snippet.title: Goodbye Deponia - Official Trailer - English
snippet.description:
After 'Deponia' and 'Chaos on Deponia' Daedalic Entertainment proudly presents the grand finale of their award winning adventure trilogy! Order it on Steam now: http://store.steampowered.com/app/241910/

The Deponia-Series tells three hilarious adventure tales featuring the protagonist Rufus of the trash-planet Deponia. In classic point&click adventure tradition these comedies shine with graphics in hand-drawn comic style, dialogues ranging from sassy to sarcastic and a good deal of black humor.
This time, on their end run towards the trilogy's finish line, no less than three Rufuses cause chaos and mayhem. On top of that, Deponia faces impending destruction by the hands of the Organon, Goal  disappeared (yet again)... And Rufus? Well, this time, our anti hero literally stands in his own light.
Goodbye Deponia is the Deponia Trilogy's epic conclusion and successor of Germany's Best Game 2013 (German Video Game Award).

Goodbye Deponia is scheduled for release on October 18th, 2013.
Claim your copy on Steam right now:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/241910/
Find further information regarding Goodbye Deponia on the official website and on Facebook:
http://deponia.de/en/
http://www.facebook.com/daedalic

Missed out on the first two installments?
Check these links :
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rAFrUKFsZ_c
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WszI_y9nQS0
